description:
Defy the laws of gravity and fly through rings of fire with the Stuntman Rider Pack! Don the flashy Stuntman costume and ride the Engraved Retro bike to show everyone that no obstacle is too tough for you. Just try not to break too many bones. The Stuntman Rider Pack includes:
- The Stuntman Helmet
- The Stuntman Jacket
- The Stuntman Pants
- The Stuntman Shoes 
- Engraved Retro Bike Bodykit
name: Stuntman Rider Pack - TrialsÂ® Rising
